website_summaries.verdict: Stylish plaid hoodie makes matching with your dog easy and fun.
pros: Available in stylish blue or red plaid
Thicker and warmer than most dog hoodies
Available in a range of sizes
Long sweater is designed to cover your dog’s whole back
cons: Back leash hole feels flimsy, may rip if your dog likes to pull

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure his neck the length of his back and his chest for a great fit
customer_reviews.text: Well this is my first review I normally don't do reviews but I had to on this sweater my pup is very huge and he has a very big head and I ordered the double XL to make sure that it would fit him. It arrived today and I put it on my baby and it is awesome I love the way it feels it fits him perfectly and it covers his whole body just about. I would recommend this sweater to anyone who has a dog and loves him dearly he will appreciate you.
customer_reviews.author: srick218

customer_reviews.title: The largest size is perfect for great danes
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a hard time finding clothing for my female 1 year and 3 month old great dane. So I took a gamble on this product, and it still has plenty of room for her to grow and it was only 15.99 Thank you for the awesome product and the amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We Both Love It
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in size L for my Teddy's birthday. I was a bit concerned it might be too big but the medium measurement was going to be snug in the chest. He is a Bichon Frise' and weighs 24 lb. It fits him so well, nice and roomy but not so big it looks saggy. I love the fleece inside, it is so soft against his body. He is very comfy in it. I like how it covers him to his tail; we live in the Midwest and it has been a COLD winter! I haven't washed it yet so cannot comment on how that goes, but I usually wash on delicate and hang dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall!
customer_reviews.text: Got an XL for my 1 year old terrier/mix (probably about 45lbs, she hasn't been weighed in awhile). Fits fine on top and legs, she is a chesty girl. The belly is way too big but she is skinny and possibly still growing. The hood is too small to pull over her head but I consider it more aesthetic than function. Super cute! I have a red flannel shirt so we get to match when we go on trails. Has a chemical smell but goes away with a wash.
customer_reviews.author: Neptune Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this do hoodie. My dog not only looks adorable but he can move easily in it and seems to be very comfortable wearing it. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I know, I know, it's a dog hoodie...
customer_reviews.text: ...but my two year old cat has allergies, and she gets itchy sometimes. I have to admit that I guessed on the sizing, but the XS fits her well (she's 8 pounds, long and lean). Best of all, it keeps her from scratching when she gets dermatitis.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: size up for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the hoodie is nice. I have a thin framed 50 pound beagle/lab mix. His neck is 17 inch diameter. I ordered the XL with a 22 inch neck diameter. All the material around the hood area makes it way too tight on my dog. He is a very typically shaped dog. Like a small lab. The arm holes seem to be too far back on the one that I got. There is a lot of excess material at his chest and he has a hard time lifting his front legs to walk up the stairs. Maybe just the one that I got, but unfortunately it is unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Super cozy perfect for my short haired little staff. He loves it and looks adorable too. I ordered a medium since hes a rather big ouooy it's TRUE to size
customer_reviews.author: joana campos

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: So we purchased it for Bear, our 60 pound male. It was too big (to be honest I didn’t look at the sizing charts). So for kicks and giggles we tried it on Demon, our 80+ pound husky. It fit him perfectly and he looks ADORABLE. Of course, he doesn’t need a jacket but I’m sure he can wear it on rare occasions when it’s cold and we go for an outing! Will be ordering another— in a L instead of XXL— for Bear again!
customer_reviews.author: Burgundy Wellesley

customer_reviews.title: He looks Dashing! -
customer_reviews.text: Such an adorable outfit. I ordered 1st 1 according to measurements & it was waaay too tight across chest, so ordered 1 size up. Fit everywhere else, but Still tight in chest. In fairness, thinking my dogs chest is just bigger than average. But, we like it enough to have it altered anyway. Too cute! It Either way, worth the alter, as himz looking Dapper!
customer_reviews.author: Ratings from a Real Person

customer_reviews.title: My 85lb pit love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find clothing for my Pitbull. I bought this hoodie in XL and it fits almost perfect. The neck might be a little tight since he has a 20 or 21 inch neck, but it doesn't seem to bother him and he seemed comfortable sleeping in it. There is enough room that he won't choke wearing it. The length is perfect and it fits his chest really well. The hood part is not functional for my dog since he has a pretty large head. Most hoods don't fit his head anyway. When you get the hoodie, it has a chemical smell to it that will go away with a washing or within a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: HackMATTr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn’t give this product 5 stars is because I bought a red one first an XL for my 70lb Boxer/Pit/Lab Mix and it fit great, seemed like good material, but he ripped the sleeves at the seems within a couple of hours. Because I was able to stitch it back together, and the price was so good, I decided to buy it in blue as well. For some reason the blue XL fit more snuggly than the red, but still fit and doesn’t shrink in the wash so no big deal. He has been wearing the blue one for 2 weeks now and no tears. So 5 stars on the 2nd one I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Nica Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Soft & cute
customer_reviews.text: Omg these are so cute & super soft. I like that these have actual sleeves to look like a real hoodie. Ordered for cooler weather & camping so both my pups can stay warm together. Ordered a medium in both the red & blue. Both chihuahua mix - Radar in red is 12lbs & Solo in blue is 14lbs. It’s a little long so we might have to modify the bottom for potty breaks but overall happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Large size great fit for my 45lb boxer?
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Boxer! I ordered the Large for my 45 lb. Boxer who has a deep chest but slim build. This size would not fit my 60 lb. Boxer who is a bit more filled out. Love the fit, male Boxer can still go to the bathroom no problem and keeps him warm! Recommend sizing up if you're not sure, not very stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: t-hart

customer_reviews.title: Fits OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought a XL for my Austrailian Shepherd/ Boarder Collie mix. She's about 4 years old, and 45 lbs. The body fits pretty well, but it is a tad snug in the arm pits and the hood is definitely too small. She gets tons of compliments when she wears it though. Everyone loves the booty pocket. She doesn't love wearing clothes, so we really only use it when we're going to be out in the cold for extended periods of time, or if it's raining on our walk. She absolutely hates getting wet and has learned that her sweatshirt keeps her mostly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkles

customer_reviews.title: This is really adorable! Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute, my pup always gets compliments in it. But he has a bit of a thick neck and I think the neckline and hood are a bit tight for him. I wish I had ordered a size up from his measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but check the sizing and long
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn’t give it five stars was the sizing. I’ll be honest and maybe it my was error in measuring but I went by the measuring guide and ordered where my dog fit in the guide. She’s a 70lb boxer mix and unfortunately it didn’t fit the chest area. Luckily my friend has a dog who is a little smaller and it fit him great. The dog loves it!! It is about a few inches long so for those with male dogs you’d probably just want to add a stitch or two to make sure they don’t pee on it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90lb pitbull/boxer mix and this fits okay. It is a little too long and a little too big for him that when he sits down the hoodie does adjust/slide down. It does not affect his walking or laying, I just have to make sure if he goes outside to pull it up so he does not pee on the belly of the hoodie! Overall a great purchase. The hoodie itself is super cute and durable. The material is very soft and not itchy at all. I would definitely purchase again just maybe in a smaller size. (I have washed and dried the hoodie numerous times and it does not shrink).
customer_reviews.author: Loveit

customer_reviews.title: *** Cheap quality***As perfect a fit as you can get for an American Staffordshire Terrier
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review. I was initially very happy and gave it 5 stars. We have had this about 2 weeks. It had been washed in normal cycle once. It is not made well. The seams are already coming undone and it has done full on holes in the seams already. Specifically around the neck and chest areas. It is a shame it is such poor quality because we initially loved the look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this dog coat!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Maine & there is a lot of snow every winter. Our pitbull, Blizzard is all white & I'm legally blind. Blizzard is not a service dog, but he is with me all the time. When we go out in the snow because of his color & my eyesight he blends in & I lose track of him & wanted to get him a coat so I could always be able to see where he is & be sure he's not wandering off. The red plaid jacket makes it easy to keep track of him! He's not crazy about wearing a jacket but he'll get used to it before winter is over! Thank you, Sandy Spiller
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Spiller

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: It's winter in Maine and after getting my dog groomed, I realized he was cold. I bought this sweatshirt so he'd have something to keep him a little warmer around the house. It is even more adorable in person. The details of the hood and the pocket make it really cute. There's also an access point between his shoulders for a harness to feed through, which is a nice touch. For sizing: he's an 18 lbs. Silky Terrier mix and the medium fits him perfectly. The size chart included in the listing seems to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gallimore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very soft
customer_reviews.text: I was not quite sure what size to buy for my dogs, Mini Aussie (30 lbs - but very fluffy) and Pit Bull (35 lbs). I purchased a Large for both. It fits them both great but the hood doesn’t fit over my pit bull’s blocky head. I decided not to exchange it for a larger size because it fits her body perfectly. Overall I am very pleased with the quality of these goodies. The inside is fleece which I think will help my Pit Bull to stay warm in walks. The quality is very good, especially for the price. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PeacockBlue11

customer_reviews.title: Handsome!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My pup is so cute. It’s a little big but that’s ok. We went with medium because of his measurements but he would have done better in a small because he’s petite. So cute a well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it. Only problem is hood falling over eyes.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 26 pound miniature labradoodle that is long and skinny. The medium would have been too short, so we got the large. It's baggy, but the perfect length. The material is quite soft, and our dog seems quite happy to keep it on during this cold spell. We don't use the hood because it is too large, but the problem is that the hood sometimes flops on by itself, at which point she comes to us for help since she can't see with it covering her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood Cat

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not great
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is really cute. I like that it has sleeves, and the hoodie-style pocket on the back is very sweet. Unfortunately, my dog hates it. I bought the XL for a 70-lb boxer, and overall the size is good, but because of his big chest it's too tight under his front legs and he's just miserable when I put it on him. The fabric was not very soft, it felt rather artificial and I was disappointed that it wasn't stretchy. If your dog has a more typical shape (like a lab), it will probably fit fine...and look adorable.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it
customer_reviews.text: Looked so cute for Christmas pictures! I bought two sizes for our dogs and each fit perfectly. If you have boy dogs I would recommend adding an elastic band to the belly part because it does hand down and doesn’t hug the belly so they might owe on it, we have girls so this isn’t an issue for us. Usually our dogs will ask for sweaters to be removed after about an hour but they were happy to be in these all night!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Deatherage

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Just Didn't Fit Our Dog
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is really well made. Our dog measures 15" around the neck, 24" around the chest, and 19" long. Initially we tried the large and it was just way too tight in the chest (our dog is muscular in that area and thin everywhere else). We returned it and bought an extra large and she was swimming it it! Unfortunately neither size fit her well so we wont be keeping either. The left picture is the large and the right picture is the extra large.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Augustyn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a bit wierd
customer_reviews.text: If it's big enough that it doesn't limit our dogs movement then it falls over her butt and pulls it backwards. We have a lab puppy. She doesn't wear it often but she's cute when she does. We ordered a size based on her measurements and it was to tight around her legs so we sent it back and got the next size up. We just have to make sure it's not pulling down over her butt.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to love wearing it
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, and shockingly, my dog seems to love it. She holds still whenever we put it on her and genuinely seems to enjoy wearing it. Of note, we bought two completely different types of sweater (the other has velcro and is reversible for wet/dry weather). The other one she does not seem to like and will bite at it. We just use this now and she's happy (and warm!)
customer_reviews.author: Candice Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for wide-chested dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this hoodie! It’s very long, but that’s my fault bc I didn’t measure before buying. But it’s very soft inside and even a little loose on my pup, which is nice bc most clothes are tight on him bc of how wide he is, and I think he appreciates the extra room. It’s great to find clothes that fit - they help with my dog’s separation anxiety, and with him being a pit with a big head it’s difficult to find anything at all. But this hoodie is wonderful and is his favorite shirt, and he even helps me put it on him.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Warm, XL sleeves don't fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought an "XL" for a 65 lb dog who hates the cold. He loves this sweater and will refuse to go outside without it on during colder mornings; it's not super thick, but about the equivalent of a hoodie. My one complaint is that the sleeves don't really line up with his shoulders (the openings line up with his elbows), so it makes an awkward shape that seems to chafe a bit; he doesn't seem to care though.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McComb

customer_reviews.title: A little tight but ok
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the XXL for my 100 lbs Doberman. As he gets older the cold isn't as friendly to him anymore. The sweater was easy to get on him but it is a bit tight in the armpits. I plan on trying to stretch it out a bit because he does like the sweater. I have no hope of the hood ever fitting though. Overall, a good purchase because my boy Vlad is happy.
customer_reviews.author: amber g

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, hood is small.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hoodie for my pit/lab mix puppy, he has a very short coat so it helps keep him warm on cold mornings. He really enjoys wearing it too! My only qualm is that I wish the good itself was a little bit bigger, as it is I won't pull it up because it's a little tight on him, although the hoodie fits him well otherwise. I expect he will grow enough to need to move up to the next size (medium) within the next month or two, so when he does I'll update this review if the hood is more appropriately sized.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay McClure

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I am cheap and I purchase these clothes for my friends fur child. That dog has no idea she is a dog! I ordered this hoodie for her dog because my friend is always wearing plaid shirts and I love hoodies. I can't wait to try it on her dog! I won't pay high dollar for animal clothes. But I like quality. This seller has adorable dog clothes and very good prices. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bellia_Ellemanae

customer_reviews.title: Way better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: My puppy isn’t very rebellious when it comes to clothes. He doesn’t try to rip them off, and he doesn’t tantrum about when he is wearing them. So, I thought this would be a cute sweatshirt for him. It did not disappoint! The quality is amazing! Which is great Bc I like to consider my boy my equal! Lol he deserves only the best and this seller delivered!!! Definitely will buy anything they sell in the future! PS the last photo I snapped mid him licking his Puppy Scoops off his nose
customer_reviews.author: Takeya Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a touch longer, but maybe my dogs are just long? Anyway, it helps keep their chihuahua shivers at bay and they look super cute in the hoodies. Also I probably could have sized up for a more relaxed fit (easier to put on), but they don't seem to mind too much so I'll leave it be. But take that into account if your pet is between sizes; I'd go with the larger option.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little hoodie, but it runs small. I measured our dog carefully, and followed the suggested size, and it fits him like a sausage casing. Edited to add: our dog is a 40 pound English cocker spaniel with a 26" chest. I ordered the size large, which is for dogs with a 28" chest, and it was very difficult to get his second leg in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality, the price is fair, and he looks good in it. It seems to keep him warm on cold day walks. It tends to run small, so if the measurements of your dog are at all close, order the next size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater for our pug!
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is great for our pug. We live in FL and he gets cold from the AC running all the time so I got him this hoodie to keep him warm in the summer and winter. We ordered size LG and it fits pretty well. It’s a little long but his tail curls up over the end. The material is soft and he doesn’t seem to mind wearing it. My only complaint was that when we received the first one it had been used and came covered in another dog’s hair. It was quickly replaced and the new one we got was brand new, no dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog sweater! Our cockapoo gets excited to put it on and never seems bothered to wear it, even after having it on for hours, so I know it's comfortable. It isn't the softest feeling material, but that doesn't bother him one bit. I already put another one in a different color in my cart to buy later!
customer_reviews.author: lrgreen

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweatshirt, runs a tad small
customer_reviews.text: This ran a little smaller than I expected, I had to exchange for the next larger size. But fabric is great and holds up great in the wash. She stays very warm and gets lots of compliments wearing it. Would purchase again, just size up when in doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this item for two different dogs. It was perfect for both! Size and fit. First dog, medium sized Collie/Dachshund mix. Second, was an average sized English Bulldog. We made a slight split at the throat of the neck and it was then a perfect fit for our Bulldog. They were all so cute in our matching family pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Christine V. Lightner-Wise

customer_reviews.title: A little tight on 13lb Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoodie in a small for my 13lb chihuahua but it is a bit snug. I do like that it is fleece lined and had sleeved. Pretty blue plaid color.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yager

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, cozy, but slightly snug on my 12lb. Yorkie/Schnauzer mix. I would say it runs small and would buy next size larger next time. I DO really like the pocket on the back for her sunglasses and cell phone!! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: VT-Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had trouble in the past finding a sweater or pajamas that stay in place on my dog. The neck usually rides down and by the middle of the night her front legs have come out the neck hole, and her legs are tangled up in the pajamas. This sweater is PERFECT!! It fits like a glove, and stays in place all night. I have a 45lb German shorthaired pointer and the large fits great. I will buy the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all dogs are built the same.
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy is a pitbull mixed with a pointer but his kinda in between Sizes. I ordered a XXL and that was way to long but perfect for his chest and head so I sent that one back and got an XL his head is a little to big but length wise and chest it fits perfect so I decided to keep the XL hoping I can wash it and not dry it so it will loosen up a little. 🤞🏽
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: nice style but runs small
customer_reviews.text: great trendy look but smaller than the sizes listed. I measured carefully and found my 60-lb Coonhund to have the same measurements as size "L" but when I got the sweater it was much too small and fit very tightly. So I just returned it since I'm not really sure if the XL would be too large.
customer_reviews.author: H. T. Minners

customer_reviews.title: Dogs look better in sweaters.
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this sweater for my 1 year old beagle to keep him warm during the winter since he is a short haired dog. This sweater is a loose fit and comfortable for him. It's almost like a pajama. I have a 28 lb miniature beagle and I bought him a large and in my eyes it fits him nicely. I prefer loose fit incase he happens to gain some extra pounds during the winter. Overall, I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 《Mimi》

customer_reviews.title: Measure your dog accurately; results will be rewarding!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought a small, which was way tiny. So I got a large. Fits her "Penny" perfectly. She is size 15 neck, 22 " length, chest is 20" and weighs 15 lbs. It's slightly long, but you can fold it up (only when your dog is ready to go to the bathroom). Poor baby was always cold from this week's rainy weather (Sherman Oaks) and was constantly shaking. This hoodie has really done the trick. Soft, durable. If she's happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Toni A. Benshimon

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Omg first of all can I say how adorable these looked on my cat and dog! The whole family matched for Christmas. I got a size small for both and they were perfect! Our cat isn’t used to sweaters so it took her some adjusting time but they are soft they are true to size they are just adorable! I do not regret my purchase whatsoever and continue to use them now because of the awesome color and design. No complaints on my part
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to the fabric
customer_reviews.text: Beware! The fabric must be treated by some type of chemical. My pup had a terrible and scary allergic reaction. Her face swelled and had hives from rubbing on the fabric as we put it on her. We had to take her to the emergency animal hospital for injected Benadryl and steroids. If you buy, wash it well before even trying it on your pup.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Coufal

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I measured both my dogs and they both fit in the range for an extra large, so I ordered an extra large for both of them. Unfortunately the XL is very tight on my larger dog. It fit my smaller dog perfectly, and she looks adorable in it. A little thinner than I expected, but I think it will be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a big boy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog coat I could find that fit I bought a size XXL for my 100 pound Labrador. He doesn't really need it but I couldn't resist it because it looks so cute on him (he might beg to differ) It is nice heavy fleece for those pups who need the warmth. It is easy on and off. The only down side is that it really picks up the fur.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The XL size fit perfect on my 64lb Shepherd mix. He’s deep chested so it’s hard finding the right fit, but this fit great. And looks great on him too! Came in a nice little bag with a cute thank you card. Would definitely buy again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarHero

customer_reviews.title: CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! Not sure if my little dog does or not. Happy with sizing, quality. Not sure about warmth yet, she hasn't worn it. Update: Colder than a well diggers nose these past 2 mornings and my little darling wore her new coat and seemed quite comfortable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mini Dachshund Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini dachshund and it’s tricky to find a fitted jacked that accommodates her broad chest and long body (and short legs) but this one does the trick! Long enough to cover her whole body and it’s stretchy enough not to constrict her chest area! Only thing is the sleeves are just a little long for her but overall it’s a great sweater especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice coat and the hoodie fit my dog. It is always a small battle to get on but once on it is nice. I had to pull all my dogs license and rabies tags through the back opening. I got it to work. I recommend this vocation for your pup this and every winter.
customer_reviews.author: William Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Jinjin the Dog LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog Jinjin loves the plaid hoodie. She is a 6lbs Pomeranian, and the sweater (size small) fits perfectly. Helps keep her warm as she's so thin. The garment is high quality and seems well made. Pros: + Fits appropriately. + Good construction, soft feeling. + Great fall look! Cons: - None at the moment, but will update this review if there is one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Falzon

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: Well the firstone I ordered based on my dog's dimensions was just a hair too small so I think it might run a little small but then I returned it and ordered the size bigger and it fits perfect and he looked really really cute and it was soft and it covers most of them so I think it'll really keep him warm I'm on our walks. I wouldJust suggest in the future that the company may be get rid of the drawstrings because the dogs just want to chew on them. But otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Amedee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It looks a bit baggy if sized correctly, but neither me or my dog minded at all. It’s soft and light, the colors are vibrant, it’s up to my expectations. The only thing I would look out for is if you have a puppy, make sure to tuck the white string at the base of the hood in. My 60 pound 1 year old Aussie shepherd started to chew on that string, so I simply tucked it and there was no more issues. Overall super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not put together well.
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater but isn’t as soft as it looked like it would be on the outside. Inside was nice. The fit was not right. XL the hood was big and roomy but almost constricting about the neck. The body fit well however the armpits cut tightly under his front legs. It’s already packed up and ready to return I don’t recall seeing the leash opening through the back of the sweater. I’m not going to unpack it to check. I could be mistaken about this part.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: Its a great sweatshirt for my dog. I guess my dog is very broad in the neck region though because the hood is tight around the neck. I did measure and it fits in all the areas that were measured just not there. I am going to snip the front where the hood strings meet to give her extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater
customer_reviews.text: I got each of these sweaters in a large for my frenchies that weigh about 28lbs. I went by the measurements and they are definitely too big I should have gotten a medium
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Cozy Dog Sweatshirt!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these sweatshirts! They are warm enough for walking on chilly days but also soft and comfy for hanging out around the house. The XXL fit our 85lb. Doberman very well and the XL fit our 55lb. Pit Mix very well too! They seemed to stretch out a little but after wearing them, but I’ve washed them once (did not dry) so I think that will help!
customer_reviews.author: SSteck

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Fabric & Return Fee of $5.99
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie looked cute. But I just wasted my money. The material was a bit stiff, and the shirt didn't fit my dog well. When I ordered it, I didn't realize that the return fee was $5.99. Had I know that, I would not have taken a chance on an article of clothing. I will not be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: TwoHooligans

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog warm outside
customer_reviews.text: This coat is absolutely wonderful, I'd always have to force my dog out when it was time for her to pee, but now she doesn't mind the cold at all with this on. The material itself is so soft that she feels comfortable in it. The only downside I had with it was that the leg sleeves made it a bit too tight for her to move her front legs all the way forward, but that's nothing a little alteration couldn't fix.
customer_reviews.author: DeV

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but I like it
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it, but it did have a really weird chemical smell that took a few washings to get rid of and it does fade when you wash it. It is on the thin side, but I didn't buy it for warmth. The extra-large fits my 65-pound dog perfect and it looks good on him too.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren’t accurate
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in sizing. I ordered an XL last year Based on my dog’s measurements and it was too big on my dog but she’s been wearing it. But i decided this year I’d order a size down based on the XL fit and get her a new one that actually fit so I ordered a size L and it’s wayyy to small. When I had emailed them last year about the XL being too big they told me there was Nothing they could do. So I’m bummed. Really want to love this sweater but I also just want it to fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I just love the way my little Yorkie looks in this ... and on the cold mornings he hasn't minded putting it on. Well he doesn't like the hood but that's OK. I have a male Yorkie who doesn't like clothes but when we are out, he has that little confident strut. Yup, I'm one of those weird Moms to a furbaby (after raising 5 human kids to adulthood) and I like for him to be cute and comfortable. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish dog hoodie, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves the extra warmth being a senior dog at 18, but she can still walk in the cooler temps with this hoodie on. Construction looks quality and inside soft, stretches around neck which is good but watch sizing and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: MalekoTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Got this to match my kids jammies for Christmas and it matched well. I ordered a large and it’s too long (my dog is a German shepherd mix that weighs about 65 pounds). The pocket was a nice touch and there’s a place to clip the leash to the collar through the shirt if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get cuter!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest dog hoodie ever!! We need some extra protection but nothing tight after our doggy had a major surgery. I went by her neck size and it is way too big, but it’s still adorable! Will be measuring the rest of her and sizing down. And surprisingly, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: in_a_bell_jar

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! My puppy looks so beautiful and comfortable in it. He loves it and so do I
customer_reviews.author: Chabeli Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Sizing might be a bit wonky but overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6lb Pomeranian. Overall the hoodie is very nice. Good quality and I’m very happy with it. My only thing is he typically wears a size small so that’s what I bought him. The neck hole is a perfect size but the body/arm holes is a little big on him.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: So soft they'll never want to take it off!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got the Large size because it is long enough to to cover his bottom when he sleeps & the hood fits his large Pittie Head!!! So far I have Nothing negative to say about the Hoodie & My dog Peetie absolutely Loves the Hoodie. When he opened the present for Christmas and tried it on & he refused to take it off because he loved it so much!!! This was the first thing that is all his that hasn't been a hand-me-down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brewington

customer_reviews.title: Dog is warm and he doesn't mind wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about dog clothes getting peed on, but as long as you get the right size it won't ever be a problem. For a standard poodle, I recommend an XL for males and an L for females to accommodate their large chest cavity.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft, and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota. My pitbull just doesnt have enough fur to keep her warm during MN winters. Never thought Id be the type to put clothing on my dogs...but the sweater was perfect. It fits her great using the measurements scale they provided. She thinks she is quite the regal girl with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Penrod

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves her new little hoodie almost as much as I do. The hood doesn’t fit very well on her head but the size of the sweatshirt otherwise is perfect! My dog is a pit bull/bulldog mix around 65lbs and an xl fit perfect. Definitely helps when it’s cold outside
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of warmth for when the house is cool for my pittie mix.. sometimes it's colder at night and this little hoodie is not only adorable but keeps her warm enough. I wish the stitching were of better quality though, it's already coming apart in a couple spots.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get it and it fit well but it pulls down when he walks making it uncomfortable unless you keep adjusting by pulling it back up to the neck. As a result the threads are already separating. Disappointed because it’s very cute & cozy
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, read sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and washes well in the washing machine. I bought a small for my 6.5lb yorkie and It's a little bit too big - I may hem the legs up a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: MobileReader

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Good material , but the sizes are not what I expected. The small runs very small and large was to big. I ordered 3 and only one small fit on one of my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lendof

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older dog that gets cold easily. We had a sweater similar to this one that lasted us three years, but even after washing it it still smelled so we went looking for a new one. We came across this one and got it since it was so similar and at first it was great! We have only had it for two weeks and it already has a hole and his arms will sometimes end up through the neck. He is not a dog who plays much, so I’m not sure how it could already have a hole and be stretched out. Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Butts

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for my shorter cut GD and he adores it
customer_reviews.text: Buy one every winter and my dog loves getting it. It usually ends with hole and practically destroyed since my other dog has decided that it’s the perfect way to pull on him while they’re playing but I’ll buy a new one next year! It fits my 43lbs golden doodle great.. well only when he’s cut short. If he has a full coat I don’t even worry about a hoodie but I like him short
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT order
customer_reviews.text: I have never smelled anything more disgusting, came in zippered bag and I took it out and gagged, smell is hard to describe but I have washed it in my washing machine twice already and have had it soaking in dawn dish soap with no change in smell. It is now soaking in Johnson’s baby shampoo and dawn again but I can still smell it-like metallic and burning plastic and burning hair. It will likely have to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: john minelli

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these hoodies. One for my cat and another for my friends. Thought it would be a fun gag gift. I paid extra to have it be next day shipped. Not only did it not show up when it was supposed too, but she received hers days later and I’ve yet to receive mine. Now it’s saying it is not sure when it will show up. I didn’t pay extra money to have to wait a week longer and for them to just forget about my order. May be a cool product but whoever’s in charge needs to fix how they run things.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable dog jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my Boxer mix because we live in Chicago area where the winters get very cold. She needs something to keep her warm during winter walks. I was looking for something that was easy to get on and off, and this product delivered! My dog loves wearing this- it seems very comfortable for her. I put her harness on over the top, and it fits perfectly. It's easy to wash and dry and so far we have been very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One is red and one in blue. My fur babies seem to love these and they fit very well. They are a very good quality for the price. Most of all they fit my babies comfy and they are warm.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyVetandNavyBrat

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off for stubby Pit Bull's
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered the size that worked best for out Pibble, but then had to return it because it was too tight and go the size up. Now the head & chest fit but the length is too long. Love the look of it and will "work" but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy strong material
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an Xl .should hve ordered a large . Fit too big for both my 70 and 50 pound babies. They hve large chest so I did not want to struggle to put their sweaters on but I could size down next time.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia gee

customer_reviews.title: So soft! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is so cute and looks great on my Doberman! For reference I bought an XL and it fits very well, it even has some stretch to it. Very warm and very soft. Apparently very comfy as well because my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good quality! I cannot wait to order more in the future. I have a 75 lb German Shepherd. I got her the XL and she could have use the L but I think after she gets fixed she will gain a little weight and it’ll fit perfect. My Frenchie is only 12 weeks old so I got him the small and it fit perfect. He will outgrow it soon but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: 45+Lb pit mix... Measured to be a Large and it fits PERFECTLY. Snug enough so it doesn't annoy her but loose enough to be comfortable. It's nice and toasty for the Mass cold weather and oh my goodness adorable on her. I wish there were more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelyn Connors

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy! My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hoodie! And so does my pittie! It’s super cute and keeps him warm. He gets tons of compliments on walks too. So if you want to make friends in your neighborhood, get this sweater for your dog. Great conversation starter. :) I read the reviews and got a large. It’s a little big but he likes curling up in it so it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Laila E.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. It fits my cat Ava great. She had a biopsy on her shoulder she was healing from, so clothes helped her not scratch or lick it. She is beautiful in literally anything she wears, let's be real, but since we live in Portland, OR, she definitely fits in with the crowd now. (ADOPT DON'T SHOP! Ava is beautiful and was $20 at a shelter, FYI.)
customer_reviews.author: Colin Owens

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Jackson received many many comments on his sweatshirt while we were on our ski trip this year. He is a 20 pound shorkie with 13" neck. It fit beautifully and it is nice and soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect -- hole on side of hoodie
customer_reviews.text: I and my dog both love this, but I got the wrong size. I was about to replace it with a size down but then I noticed a hole on the right side of the hoodie. The hole is not too big a deal since I was going to return it and get a different size anyway, but it's definitely worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my rescue dogs. They are so cute! They are both around 60lb dogs, one is tall and thin, one is short and muscular. The XL fits both, but neither can comfortably fit the hood on their head without it being too tight. But that’s okay! Still cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ali R

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable hoodie. We used these with both our dogs while camping and they kept the pups warm while also protecting them from tree sap etc. Unfortunately, the smaller one we purchased is already fraying at the neck so not sure how well they’ll hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelly

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed on how good the material of this dog hoodie is. I have bought items like this one before from other companies and none had exceeded my expectations as far as this one. My dog loved it he was happy to wear it and keep him warm in these super cold temperatures of ND. Will definitely buy again from them in the future. The back part was a little bit too long but I had to buy him an xxl because with him being a pitbull his chest is wide and an xl wouldn’t had fit. But he likes to have blankets so I don’t think he would mind the extra coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: KOOLTAIL Plaid Dog Hoodie Pet Clothes Sweaters with Hat
feature_bullets: XL- Neck girth: 22 inches, chest girth: 34 inches, back length: 24 inches
Material: 65% polyester, 35% cotton, soft and comfortable, machine washable
Back has a hole, leash can through it, convenient for going out to walking
Classics plaid pattern, kangaroo pocket, makes your pet cooler and cuter.NOTICE:Our Pattern has been Patented
Keep warm in cold weather, thicker than most of the hoodies, firm handfeel

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
